user.name: Sanjay Kumar
user.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
user.bio: Passionate developer specializing in modern web technologies, AI integration, and creating innovative user experiences. Building the future, one line of code at a time.

resume.summary: Innovative Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and AI-powered solutions. Passionate about creating seamless user experiences and leveraging cutting-edge technologies to solve complex problems.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Lead development of enterprise-scale applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Implemented AI-powered features that increased user engagement by 40%.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications serving 100K+ users. Built robust APIs and implemented real-time features using WebSocket technology.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Created responsive web applications and interactive user interfaces for various clients. Focused on performance optimization and accessibility standards.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.title: AI Chat Platform
projects.description: Real-time chat application with AI-powered responses and smart conversation analytics.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive chat platform that integrates multiple AI models to provide intelligent responses, conversation summaries, and user sentiment analysis. Built with modern web technologies and deployed on cloud infrastructure.

projects.title: E-commerce Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Advanced analytics dashboard for e-commerce businesses with real-time data visualization.
projects.longDescription: A powerful analytics dashboard that helps e-commerce businesses track sales, analyze customer behavior, and optimize their operations. Features interactive charts, real-time updates, and AI-powered insights.

projects.title: Smart Weather App
projects.description: Mobile-first weather application with AI-powered weather predictions and personalized recommendations.
projects.longDescription: An intelligent weather application that not only provides current weather data but also uses machine learning to predict weather patterns and give personalized recommendations for daily activities.
